metadata.title: Support - Escrow Protocol
metadata.description: Get support for the Escrow Protocol. Request early access, contact our team, and stay updated with the latest news.

hero.title: Join the Early Access Program
hero.subtitle: The protocol is currently working on an invite-only basis. Exporters, importers, trade advisors, and freelancers are welcome to leave their contact details and will be contacted to discuss how the protocol can benefit their business.

form.title: Request Early Access
form.description: Tell us about your business and we'll reach out to discuss how the escrow protocol can help you.
form.businessPlaceholder: What type of transactions do you handle? What challenges are you facing?
form.footer: We'll review your application and reach out within 48 hours.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a specific question or need personalized help? Send us a message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates on protocol development, new features, and important announcements delivered to your inbox.

cta.title: Still Need Help?
cta.subtitle: The support team is here to help you succeed. Get in touch and receive a response within 24 hours.
